abstract: UP2U, the new stick gum from the maker of Mentos, is establishing its brand in social media like Facebook before it begins a television campaign.
snippet: UP2U, the new stick gum from the maker of Mentos, is establishing its brand in social media like Facebook before it begins a television campaign.
lead_paragraph: A  BRAND that has been present online since the days this newspaper still included “http://” in Web addresses is expanding its digital marketing tactics by embracing social media.

headline.main: Building a Buzz in Social Media Ahead of Traditional Marketing
headline.print_headline: Building a Buzz in Social Media Ahead of Traditional Marketing
